## BlendingState.setBlendFuncAlpha() method

Sets the blending function for the alpha channel

**Signature:**

```typescript
setBlendFuncAlpha(src: BlendFunc, dest: BlendFunc): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  src | [BlendFunc](doc/markdown/./device.blendfunc.md) | The source blending function |
|  dest | [BlendFunc](doc/markdown/./device.blendfunc.md) | The destination blending function |

this

self
